title: TIRA paper upgraded to Oral at NeurIPS W 2025
text: Our TIRA paper has been upgraded to an Oral at NeurIPS W 2025.

title: Training Time Explainability accepted at NeurIPS 2025 Workshop
text: Our collaboration titled Training Time Explainability for Multilingual Hate Speech Detection has been accepted at NeurIPS 2025 Workshop.

title: Targeted Identity Re Association Attacks accepted at NeurIPS 2025
text: Our work on targeted identity re association attacks and their impact on model fairness has been accepted at NeurIPS 2025 Workshop.

title: Best Paper Explanation Award On the Biology of a Large Language Model
text: We have been awarded the Best Paper Explanation Award for our presentation On the Biology of a Large Language Model.
